name: When Penguins Fly
description:
Can penguins fly? Well, they can't fly, but they can glide!

Help the penguin glide as far as possible! Avoid clouds and fly on wind currents!

Controls: Left Mouse Button to boost up.

This game was made in 2 days for the 50th Ludum Dare Game Jam, with the theme "Delay the Inevitable". 

Credits:

  • Art: Akijpg
  • Programming/Music&Sounds: Randoraz
